reviews.text:
Lamp atmosphere...Delicious coffee...And a myriad of trush tinctures!!!...Imagined it!?!)...All this is easy to turn into reality in Ch&P.
I am very glad that I found this institution, in Podol, because it fit in the vibe there as best as possible!!
Pros:
- very tasty, and most importantly, real tinctures, without chemical additives (and I tasted a lot of them in different parts of Ukraine, so a little, but I understand!))
- The interior is incredibly cool!! üòçWhat are the paintings on the second floor worth? : Gogol, Shevchenko and Lesya Ukrainka in the modern vision - wonderful!!!
And also, it's very cool that in the ladies' room there are clothes and shoes cleaning products - this is important and nice!)
- Coffee...mmmm.... She is ... super mega - extra tasty!! ‚ù§Ô∏èAnd it's true! (I love pure espresso, so I feel the taste as best as possible!)
I would like to single out the owner of the establishment Yevhena! I saw him for the first time, and I have the impression that we have been friends for 10 years!))))) Very pleasant and hospitable!! ü§ó
And of course, the bartender Ivan!) Special thanks to him for his sense of humor, story about Arabica ü§óüòç and mood!!!
Cons:
- from appetizers, only desserts are offered, but I would like something salty, especially for tincturesüôÉ‚ò∫Ô∏è, last time, the owner of the establishment treated me with jamon, for which I THANK him very much!! and promised to expand the assortment !!!!! I will come and check!!!!üòÖüòÉü•∞ Therefore.... In general ‚Ä¶..-
Definitely recommend!)

Pyana Vyshnya, of course it‚Äôs good... It was. 3 years ago, until it turned into an industrial bottling plant, so the appearance of the Chashka and Plyashka establishment is very timely and opportune. This is a great place with a good assortment of liqueurs, just the thing to get you in the mood to get a little tipsy, but you don‚Äôt want classic cocktails or you want something light and tasty.
In general, the liqueurs are excellent, the cocktails - you have to try and find your taste, for example Dead Souls, an ideal replacement for the poppy Apperol spritz. Service is customer-oriented and attentive. The interior is spot on, laconic and cozy, the ‚Äúfrescoes‚Äù are just perfect).
Definitely worth visiting more than once.
The disadvantages are the lack of covers/umbrellas on the terrace and the sofas have uncomfortable backs. But this will not affect your enjoyment of visiting this place.)

We were looking for delicious coffee and came in for the first time.
The overall impression is not happy.
I was interested in a coffee called ‚ÄúCava u Vogni‚Äù and wanted to ask the bartender what it was. In response, we received a lot of praise from the bartender for this coffee and that we would like it very much, but he would not say what it was. (initially we wanted a filter, but there wasn‚Äôt one) We took this coffee because of the bartender‚Äôs persuasion, and it ended up being a Cappuccino with a sugar crust (we don‚Äôt like sweet coffee).
It was upsetting that the bartender convinced us that we would like this coffee, although he didn‚Äôt even ask our preferences.
The quiche with chicken and mushrooms was very greasy on the inside and dried out on the outside, obviously not fresh, or very weathered.
The macarons were delicious, but it took a long time to find out the flavors from the bartender, so we just had to take them at random.
The only thing that pleased me was the variety and taste of the infusions.
As for the bartender's communication, it is very intrusive. Not every person needs to be communicated in the same way.

Very tasty coffee. Really tasty. And good service.
I wanted to drink a cappuccino with some kind of syrup, to which they told me that they don‚Äôt have syrups so as not to spoil the taste of the coffee with them. I was surprised, but in the end I didn‚Äôt regret it at all! Well done guys for not ruining their great coffee with pop syrups. Shiro dyakuyu for savoring the kava!

A decent place with a pleasant interior, everything seems to be according to the standard - a bar counter, a separate room for gatherings, but the bartender Ivan, a master of his craft, always raises the mood. Quite a wide range of drinks and soft drinks, pleasant unobtrusive music in the background. In a word, I am delighted with this place!
